name: Waltz of Auri
description:
In "Waltz of Auri" you play as Auri, one of the Astrologers of an ancient order that makes gifts to all the civilisations in a planet every thousand years. Draw power from the constellations to make a gift to a city.

Controls:

Move with A, S or with the Left and Right arrow keys.

Interact with the Space bar.

Use the mouse to link the constellations.

art & animation - Hellyon White

sound & music - Daniel Parejo

code  - Carlos Cortés

design - Miguel López-Bachiller

Game made in the Talentum Telefonica Gamejam in 72 hours.
